### HIGHLIGHTED PROJECTS:

**Voice controlled Motion detector.** 
Description: Motion sensor activated security system which sounds an alarm when it detects any motion. Motion is detected through an image processing algorithm. Tools & Technologies: Java, AWT, Sphinx API for voice, web cam, Lego Mindstrom API
